definitions.title: adj. barren
definitions.body: ;—´[[ע]] of male De 7:14, [[עֲקָרָה]] of female v:De 7:14 (mankind and beasts), Ex 23:26 (E; female); elsewhere of women Ge 11:30, Ge 25:21, Ge 29:31 (all J), Ju Jdg 13:2, Jdg 13:3, 1Sa 2:5, Job 24:21, Ps 113:9 ([[עֲקֶרֶת]] cstr.); of personif. Zion Is 54:1.
